text: @EricTrump At least he didn't have 6600 losers show up who still believe your father's lies that Covid-19 is just like the flu. Hint: the flu kills 20-60,000 ppl /year. Covid has killed over 120,000 in less than 4 months bc of your father. How does it feel to be in the most reviled family
